title: 93/249/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 April 1993 repealing Decision 93/78/EEC (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 14 April 1993 repealing Decision 93/78/EEC (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
(93/249/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 April 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 30, 6. 2. 1993, p. 64.
